issue.message: One or more images in this project can be converted to the WebP format which typically results in smaller file sizes, even for lossless conversion (but launcher icons should use PNG).
Missing the following drawables in `drawable-hdpi`: ic_double_chain.png (found in drawable-xxxhdpi)
Missing the following drawables in `drawable-mdpi`: ic_double_chain.png, icon_teeth.png
Missing the following drawables in `drawable-xhdpi`: ic_double_chain.png (found in drawable-xxxhdpi)
Missing the following drawables in `drawable-xxhdpi`: ic_double_chain.png (found in drawable-xxxhdpi)
